metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5471 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Memory safety bugs were reported in Firefox 53. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort that some of these could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 54.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs38 contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '54.0+build3-0ubuntu1').
